ctl:form.h1: Web Coverage Service 2.0 Range Subsetting Extension
ctl:form.p: The Web Coverage Service tests script is designed to test WCS 2.0 Range Subsetting extension.
A complete list of tests in the test suite are available in OGC 12-040 document, but note that not all of the tests are applicable to all servers.
One of the offered coverages shall contain at least 3 range components.
Enter a tes entry URL below (the service endpoint should be specified without any query parameters). A typical GetCapabilities request will take this form:
ctl:form.xhtml:p: Precondition:Enter the URL of the wcs2 that you want to validate:
